profile_positions.description: As engineer you want to do programming as much and easy as possible. You don't want to be distracted by unavailble services and manual procedures to get started. Within Tech4Dev we are working to get happy engineers and give solutions so the focus on there work and be facilitated as much as possible on overhead items and dependencies. As Tech Lead I am responsible for several teams who are delivering the services that help our engineers to have an easier adherence process and optimized crypto services.
profile_positions.title: Tech Lead Tech4Dev

profile_positions.description:
Working for Rabobank since 1997 in several area's and functions:
Area's: Raboabnk internal systems, securites, international payments, domestic payments, SEPA payments, domain Payments, Savings and Investments
Functions: COBOL developer, test analyst, project manager, business analyst, test manager.
From 2014 till 2023 full focus on (test)n automation within the Rabobank and per 2023 focus on automaation and optimization of service to have happy engineers within the Rabobank
Currently working as: Tech Lead within Tech4Dev
profile_positions.title: Tech Lead Tech4Dev

profile_positions.description: I lead a team of (test) automation professionals that developed solutions to improve the quality of software delivery and speed up the delivery of this software. These solutions include automation of all aspects of test automation like test design, test optimization, test exeution, test environments (service virtualization) and test data. Also the alignment of test automation in a CI/CD pipeline is a core activity of my team. The solutions and suppoort on the solution, can be used by all Rabobank devops teams (squads) to become faster with higher quality and keep the focus on delivering business value. I give consulting to teams how best to become faster by automation and how best to use the solutions of my team. Last but not least the team and I keep innovating on the solutions by looking at the market developments and implementing concrete team (squad) requirements.
profile_positions.title: IT Lead Radical Automation Services

profile_positions.description: Per March 1st I am delivery manager of the Radical Automation team within the Payments, Savings and Investments (PSI) domain of Rabobank. In this role I am responsible to help, with my team, the devops team within PSI to do their radical (test) automation. Focus is the complete delivery pipeline but basic knowledge and tools we as radical automation team facilitate is test automation. Next to helping other team I see it as my responsibility to be there for my team and get the best out them and help them to achieve this. This job is a good next step to my previous job when I did the consultancy to the devops team from within the Radical Automation team.
profile_positions.title: Delivery Manager PSI-Radical Automation

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for test automation of the payment domain  while renewing the payment systems. This includes creating a test strategy, facilitating the automation team with the required environments and test data, give direction to the team and finding tools to make the automation more effective and efficient.

The job has evolved in being an automation consultant within the Payment, Savings and Investments domain. Next to that I am product owner for 3 tools we facilitatie with our team to do automation within PSI.
profile_positions.title: Test Manager

profile_positions.description:
Testmanager binnen het programma SEPA (Single Euro Payment Area)
Binnen het programma SEPA als testmanager actief in het project Euro Betaling Fase 1 (ook wel Credit Transfers of CT genoemd).

Daarna ook de vervolgactie projecten opgepakt om volledig SEPA compliant te worden.
profile_positions.title: Testmanager

profile_positions.description: Opstellen teststrategie en managen van het onderhoud op het OPF systeem dat zorgt voor de SEPA betalingen binnen de Rabobank. Dit systeem is de afgelopen jaren middels diverse SEPA projecten geïmplementeerd, ingericht, uitgebouwd totdat de volledige SEPA functionaliteit aanwezig gereed was. Nu komt het systeem meer in de onderhoud modus en moeten de testen daarop ingericht en gestandaardiseerd worden. Denk aan automatische regressietest, generieke aanpak per release, uniformiteit in testgevallen en -verantwoording (resultaat weergave).
profile_positions.title: Test Manager

profile_positions.description:
Diverse testopdachten uitgevoerd als testcoördinator en testmanager
De laatst 4 jaar ingezet in het effectendomein.
In 2007 cetificaat voor ISEB Practitioner gehaald
profile_positions.title: Testmanager

profile_positions.description: Gestart als Cobol programmeur en daarna via diverse stappen doorgegroeid naar huidige functie als testmanager binnen Rabobank Nederland
profile_positions.title: Programmeur, analist, projectmanagement
